sentences.en: a university with a high dropout rate
Because Bill Gates , richest man on the planet - for now anyway - is a college dropout, and you not.
sentences.cn: 因为比尔盖茨, 这个行星上最富有的人 --- 就目前而言 --- 是个退学生, 而你不是.

sentences.en: Galo said these lower the dropout voltage.
He is a dropout, and messes around all day.
sentences.cn: 他是一名流失生, 整天游手好闲.

sentences.en: He might be a college dropout but he's made a fortune in business.
sentences.cn: 他可能中途离开大学,但在商界发了财.

sentences.en: In 1972, the dropout rate among those whom Aspira counsels was 6 . 6 percent.
sentences.cn: 1972年埃斯皮拉所辅导的学生, 退学率只占6.6%.

sentences.en: In the long haul, she'll regret having been a school dropout.
sentences.cn: 她终归会后悔不该中途辍学.

sentences.en: My diseases are an asthma and a dropout and, what is less curable , seventy - five .
sentences.cn: 我的病是气喘和水肿, 还有无可救药的是 七十五 (岁).

sentences.en: Peritonitis is still a cause of dropout and hospitalization in PD patients.
sentences.cn: 腹膜炎仍然是导致腹膜透析患者住院和退出的住院原因之一.

sentences.en: Stanford dropout, treasure hunter. Only to date.
sentences.cn: 斯坦福的辍学生, 寻宝者. 只是到目前为止.

sentences.en: The causes of the wearable zone dropout were analyzed by the metallography analysis and SEM.
sentences.cn: 采用金相分析和扫描电镜分析方法,分析了钻杆接头喷焊耐磨带脱落原因.

sentences.en: The dropout rate from distance education andis higher than for traditional and programs.
sentences.cn: 并不是每个人都适合参加远程教育,远程教育的辍学率要比传统教育的高.

sentences.en: The predictive factors for dropout were female gender and the presence of coexisting chronic diseases.
sentences.cn: 中辍的预测因子为女性及同时有其他慢性病存在.

sentences.en: There is a high dropout rate from some college courses.
sentences.cn: 有些大学课程的退出率很高.

sentences.en: To prevent the dropout effects means for synchronizing are provided.
sentences.cn: 为了防止脱落效应,提供了同步装置.

trans.tran_en: someone who leaves school or college before they have finished
